# bs-list-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                        | Type                                                                                            | Default |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `GroupType` | `group-type` | 不同展示形态：flush去除除底边外边框；Numbered显示编号；horizontal：横向排序； | `"flush" \| "horizontal" \| "numbered"`                                                         | `null`  |
| `class`     | `class`      | 组件 class 样式                                        | `string`                                                                                        | `""`    |
| `type`      | `type`       | 主题色                                                | `"danger" \| "dark" \| "info" \| "light" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `null`  |
